Name: OpenShopBillingPackage
Description: Open the shop and show the billing package

Name: OpenShopOfferBundle
Description: Open the shop and show bundle

Name: OpenShopBuilding
Description: Open the shop and show the building

Name: OpenShopTrap
Description: Open the shop and show the trap

Name: OpenTrainingTroop
Description: Open the training screen and show the troop

Name: OpenTrainingSpell
Description: Open the training screen and show the spell

Name: OpenWeb
Description: Open default browser and go to address
If address cannot be opened i.e. clashroyale:// then the following urls are tested.

Name: Share
Description: Open native share dialogue with message

Name: OpenEvents
Description: Open event calendar and highlight event

Name: SelectGameObject
Description: Select first game object with name

Name: OpenHelpshift
Description: Open Helpshift. Show article if defined, show section if defined, else show FAQ.
